quote: We carry secrets under our skin like shrapnel. Our surface wounds heal, but the damage festers underneath while we worry what tiny pieces will work their way to the surface for the world to see.
quote_letters: WE CARRY SECRETS UNDER OUR SKIN LIKE SHRAPNEL OUR SURFACE WOUNDS HEAL BUT THE DAMAGE FESTERS UNDERNEATH WHILE WE WORRY WHAT TINY PIECES WILL WORK THEIR WAY TO THE SURFACE FOR THE WORLD TO SEE
